column1: The Purple Pig////The food here was really amazing and is deserving of a 5 star rating. The antipasti we ordered
column5: was the best broccoli I've ever had in my life. We also had the Fava Bean Smear
column10: and the lamb with couscous and pomegranate (flavors were too intense but good nonetheless). After trying the food here
column11: I questioned why Purple Pig only had 4 stars.
